planners.Title: Planners
planners.Description: View and manage available planners for solving planning problems.

solvers.Title: Solvers
solvers.Description: Access available solvers to compute solutions for defined problems.

solve.Title: Solve
solve.Description: Submit a planning problem to be solved using selected planners and solvers.

minizinc.Title: MiniZinc
minizinc.Description: Solve planning problems defined in MiniZinc format.

pddl.Title: PDDL
pddl.Description: Solve planning problems defined in PDDL format.

validate.Title: Validate
validate.Description: Check the correctness and consistency of generated plans or solutions.

plan.Title: Plan
plan.Description: Validate the correctness of generated plans.

pddl.Title: PDDL
pddl.Description: Validate the syntax and structure of PDDL domain/problem files.

match.Title: Match
match.Description: Check consistency between domain, problem, and plan files.

convert.Title: Convert
convert.Description: Convert between different formats, e.g., PDDL, Mermaid, or other supported representations.

natural_language.Title: Natural Language
natural_language.Description: Convert natural language descriptions into formal representations.

mermaid.Title: Mermaid
mermaid.Description: Convert between PDDL and Mermaid-style diagrams for visualization.

chart.Title: Interactive Chart
chart.Description: Display interactive charts to visualize planning steps and schedules.

render.Title: Chart Render
render.Description: Open the interactive chart rendering view.
